      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to run the client. It first check if an already existing token can be used to reconncet to a prevoius game. In this case the game is joined automatically. Otherwise the phase of choosing a game and playing is done. In case of lost connection this method is called.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
